report.title: Species & Occurrence Counts
report.description: Gives a total number of species and occurrences recorded according to the filter.
report.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT o.taxon_meaning_id) as species_count, count(DISTINCT o.id) as occurrences_count FROM cache_occurrences_functional o WHERE o.zero_abundance='f' AND #website_filter# AND (CAST(o.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) GROUP BY website_id

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys
